phrases: There was a Scub Burst in Phoenix, Arizona eight hours ago.
Although the United States Army brought its full force to intercept the Secret,
Is not this the first time a Scub showed up in America?
Scub Bursts have, in fact, occurred in the US a couple of times.
However, no Secrets have ever emerged in any of those cases.
Even though they failed to stop the Secret...
Would they still request our help?
The last Scub Burst in America...
I cannot imagine them requesting help from us.
Well, it is not entirely out of the question either.
At the moment, team Pied Piper is standing by on the Mexican side of the Arizona border.
Yout just need to officially request our help using your power as the governor of the state.
Precisely because it is simple, there are bound to be many in opposition.
This is a matter I want to take my time to thoroughly consider.
We have already had to wait this long!
I am glad to see you are alive and well.
Hey, what is the meaning of this?
I would assume you knew since you take orders directly from the company president.
As you know, the mother company of Generation Bleu
is the largest PR company in the US.
The truth is, I worked there too until I switched to a political career.
Our relationship is that of a mentor to a protegee.
Our greatest achievement was silently erasing an entire country from the face of Earth.
The smoldering ethnic conflicts of the Balkan Peninsula
turned into a civil war after a Scub Burst.
As they were on the losing side, the state as an institution was destroyed.
And not a single country offered to help.
That country was preparing for ethnic cleansing.
The genocide was just an illusion that we, the PR company, created.
There was no good or evil in that conflict.
But the world does not move unless a distinction between good and evil is made.
And you made a profit off of that?
You are doing the same thing now as you have been all along.
Are not you secretly trying to get me to do your bidding this very moment?
You should not come in here.
is a story based on a historical incident in Germany.
Why is our team named after the Pied Piper of Hamelin?
A piper was hired to rid the town of mice,
but he was denied payment after completing his job.
Thus, he led away the children of the town.
Let me explain the possible meaning of the legend.
One is that the piper was a harbinger of death,
and the story symbolizes the death of countless children due to plague and other reasons.
A different explanation suggests that the children were led away
on a pilgrimage or to join an army such as the Children's Crusade.
Furthermore, in the 20th century, there were explanations
that claimed the children left the town by their own free will.
In many East European villages and towns,
there are historical remains related to the children of Hamelin.
You are still going on about that...
The United States Army has made a move.
They are sending in a second wave of attacks.
The ZOA generated by this Secret is considered to be exceptionally large.
The participants in the first wave of attack approached carelessly and was completely annihilated.
They are not used to fighting against Secrets,
so they want to avoid losing anymore IFO units.
Since the Secret reacts to flying IFOs, they will move in with infantry.
To meet up with the American forces and assist them.
Hey, it is not the time for jokes.
You are still our employee, remember?
I act by my own judgment.
After we cross the border, refuse identification requests and avoid border examination.
That is possible, but we will be violating laws.
I volunteered, and you would need someone to pilot it anyway.
I was thinking that this is not like you.
You do not usually go against orders issued by the president.
The Americans are not that stupid to engage in such a strategy on a whim.
They must have considered using infantry against Secrets for a while.
So they have experiment results to support it?
I have a bad feeling about this.
An evacuation order was issued for this area.
He threatened us into gathering here!
By your sacrifice, the truth of the Secrets will be revealed.
The second wave of attack has failed as well.
All units were annihilated by unexpected attacks.
So do you feel like acting a bit more serious now?
I do not know the details yet.
The right to request emergency mobilization from Generation Bleu is still in my hands.
Are you still going on about that?
Hurry up and hide inside the building!
The Secret only reacts to machinery and IFOs!
Secrets are not what you think they are.
They are still looking for us.
We cannot contact the army unless we return to the choppers.
Whatever happens, Mommy is going to protect you.
When the infantry attacked the Secret,
it reacted by directly annihilating the troops.
It annihilated everyone in its way, no matter if they were armed or not.
Is this the unexpected attack he talked about?
What about Ao and the Chief?
You have free hand in deciding our conditions.
What are you so scared about?
I have heard about what happened to his home country.
I have brought you to a dreadful place.
I chose the name Pied Piper for the team.
My home country does not exist anymore.
They made light of some information, and by the time they realized, the whole world turned against them.
My wife and child died when we got dragged into the fight.
Many others have died as well.
But I have no right to hate the enemy.
We have done the same thing.
I agreed to join Generation Bleu to repent for my sins.
But only children can pilot IFOs.
The Pied Piper is me myself.
I lead you to the battlefield as I play my flute.
But the Piper will not let you die no matter what.
What is the meaning of this?!
On a higher floor, I saw some mannequins shot to pieces.
Are you telling me they identify humans by our form?
That is what I thought too, which is why I conducted an experiment.
I do not want to see people die anymore.
Everyone, I ask you to believe in and follow us!
The Chief and I are going to lead all of you to safety!
We are the Pied Piper after all!
We once had the power to erase an entire country from existence.
I will not let you say you have changed since then.
This time, we are going to make the world move ourselves.
I might as well request emergency mobilization from Generation Bleu.
The Governor of Arizona requested emergency mobilization.
The Triton is to launch immediately.
First, retrieve Ivica, Ao, and Rebecka, then destroy the Secret.
Let us get away from here quickly and get somewhere safe!
Again, we thank you for your help.
The Triton is confirmed to be closing in.
Have they gotten the mobilization request?
We must hurry and destroy the Secret quickly.
If it makes it to a city, there will be disaster.
The ZOA reaches all this way?
Are we at the meeting point yet?
It recognized the human form Nirvash as an enemy.
Our chance comes when it opens its mouth to let out its Options!
When it does, shoot it with all you have got!
Do not carelessly mention her past ever again.
Have you seen through it all?
She is only dedicated to you because of her sense of guilt!
These children need a piper to lead them.
Actually it might have been the children playing the pipe.
Next time in Eureka Seven AO.
A small intruder makes the girl's past resurface.
The other self-reflected image in the mirror starts moving again.
Who will find the truth, as her true self quivers?
Eureka Seven AO, episode eleven: Plateau of Mirrors.
Listen to the voices of the children of the stars.

tameiki wo tsuite sora wo miru
aoku somerareta hitomi no oku de kagayaiteru no wa
doko de mo yukeru, yume wo miteru
nobashita te wa asu wo egaku

Shining deep within my eyes, reflecting its blue,
is a dreamer who can overcome anything
are dyed by rainbows and fly

My heart is racing and beating loud
Even if the wind is blowing hard
Do not close your eyes and always look on ahead
If you feel like crying, remember
The young birds in the sky sing
though they still cannot fly well
Even if we go beyond the edge of time
I will only follow you as we hold hands
So I never let you go!
may get lost in the infinity of the sky,
I can still find you without hesitation
